name: Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen
description: Hopefully makes the installer, install WineTricks to make the game actually run past the starting screen. Hopefully...
notes: adds WineTricks: d3dx9, vcrun2010, wmp9, xact
content:
game:
  appid: 367500
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win32
    description: Installing XACT
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win32
    description: Installing vcrun2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp9 win7
    arch: win32
    description: Installing wmp9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
